page.title: 06CLOTHES IN SUTTON IN A.
page.content: We went to eight well-known clothes shops and asked them some questions and came up with these answers:- The most fashionable colours for summer are{pastel shades.} The most fashionable material is{ {cotton mostly creased.} The most fashionable designs for men are{canvas trousers and tight {jeans.} The most fashionable designs for women are{fashion skirts and tops.} The most fashionable designs for children are{flying suits,skirts and {tops.} The most fashionable designs for the elderly are{loose fitting dresses. The people who buy the most clothes are women aged between 19 and 40. LOUISE JONES,LOUISE RADFORD,JULIA STEVENSON,LISA PATCHETT.
